name: jpake
description: This library allows 2 parties to generate a mutual secret key using a weak key that is known to each other beforehand using Password Authenticated Key Exchange by Juggling (J-PAKE) based on elliptic curves.

scripts.build: npm link webpack && npm link typescript && npm link ts-loader && webpack --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.buildprod: npm link webpack && npm link typescript && npm link ts-loader && webpack --config webpack.prod.js

author: choonkiatlee
